name: Codagon
description: A dragon-like creature with scales resembling various coding symbols. It breathes fire that looks like binary code.

name: Bugabyte
description: A small, bug-shaped monster known for causing chaos in the digital realm. It can duplicate itself rapidly.

name: Pixelfin
description: An aquatic monster that can manipulate digital displays and create illusions with pixels.

name: Scriptail
description: A fast and agile monster with a tail that can morph into different coding languages to attack or defend.

name: Hackshock
description: A monster with electrical powers that can hack into devices and control them temporarily.

name: Bytebeast
description: A large, powerful monster made of corrupted data and broken code, it grows stronger from digital disorder.

name: Quickfix
description: A mischievous monster that excels in quick fixes and temporary patches, often leaving behind a trail of bugs.

name: Queryquin
description: A creature that can summon data with ease, it attacks using complex queries that baffle its opponents.

name: Logiclops
description: A cyclops monster with a keen sense of logic and reasoning, able to solve complex problems to defeat opponents.

name: ProtoPhantom
description: A ghostly figure that can phase through digital defenses, specializing in stealth and infiltration.
